Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Hotel Riu Monica in Nerja, you'll be on the beach and minutes from Torrecilla Beach and Chanquete's Boat. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of El Playazo Beach and Salon Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 234 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature bidets and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a fitness center. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), an arcade/game room, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Riu Monica. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Riu Monica. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Hotel Riu Monica in Nerja, you'll be on the beach and minutes from Torrecilla Beach and Chanquete's Boat. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of El Playazo Beach and Salon Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Torrecilla Beach - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Chanquete's Boat - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
El Playazo Beach - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Salon Beach - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Balcon de Europa - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Nerja Beach - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Carabeo Beach - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Burriana Beach - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Nerja Caves - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Ferrara Beach - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Canuelo Beach - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
El Morche Beach - 9.9 km / 6.1 mi
La Herradura Castle - 12.1 km / 7.5 mi
Pena Escrita - 13.3 km / 8.3 mi
Baviera Golf - 16.5 km / 10.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Riu Monica is Malaga (AGP) - 54.6 km / 34 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
